name: Super Space Swiper
description:
Get ready to hurtle into space aboard your super bike. Swipe from track to track, watching out for obstacles.

Super Space Swiper is a journey through the stars accompanied by bright colors, the typical atmosphere of the disco music of the past and David Hasselhoff. Faster and faster, more and more difficult! Put on your helmet and start the engine.

How far can you go?

- Hurtle farther and farther away.

- Improve your reflexes.

- Enjoy the music from the '80s.

- Challenge yourself and your friends.

- Share your records.

- Be competitive and rise in ranking.

Visit us:

www.pajamasteam.com
